title: Work or play in comfort with this durable, ergonomic laptop stand, now under $96
content:
Macworld

If you’re still using your laptop for work or school without a laptop stand, you might strain your neck and shoulders. Fortunately, you can add this laptop enhancement at an affordable price and promote a more ergonomic work experience.

The CASA Hub Stand Pro is a comprehensive solution for greater comfort while using your laptop, and now, it’s on sale for only $95.97 (reg. $129) through March 24.

Thanks to its highly adjustable design, the CASA hub can ensure your laptop is positioned at just the optimal viewing angle. Aside from offering unobstructed views, the 360° horizontally rotating base also has an anti-slip grip for added stability on any surface.

Constructed from durable aluminum, this laptop stand complements high-end computing equipment. Compatible with MacBooks and even iPads, it features a six-port connectivity hub, facilitating easy management of all your peripherals. There’s also a right-angle cable that provides a tighter connection between different devices.

Its HDMI 4K 60Hz output is available, so you can easily connect your MacBook or other device to an external monitor. Better yet, the CASA Hub is space efficient, meaning it won’t take up much room on work surfaces.

Transform your workstation when you grab the 6-in-1 CASA HUB Stand Pro Laptop Stand, now just $95.97 until March 24 at 11:59 PM Pacific.
